entry.title: Thursday night: A few rain showers or flurries. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few rain showers beginning late in the evening then changing to snow or ice pellets after midnight. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Local snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 late in the evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 6:20 PM EDT Wednesday 12 April 2023
